hero.subtitle: Changing families from dependency to self-sustainability

about.title: Our Mission
about.paragraph: American Education and Teachers is a non-governmental organization dedicated to empowering communities in Africa. Founded in 2024, our mission is to create a pathway for families to transition from dependency to self-sustainability through a focus on education and teacher development.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: We provide comprehensive support to orphans and displaced families through education, medical care, emergency relief, and sustainable farming.

items.title: Education
items.description1: Vocational Training Institute provides skills in tailoring, knitting, carpentry, and more for orphans who were unable to return to school.
items.description2: Our Community School specializes in providing education and care to children with disabilities.

items.title: Medical
items.description1: Medical Clinic offers HIV and AIDS positive treatment to orphans and their caretakers, in addition to general medical services.
items.description2: Children's Home cares for children ages 2 months to 17 years old by providing opportunities for education and healthy lives.

items.title: Emergency Relief Fund
items.description1: We have created an emergency relief fund to address unexpected specific medical needs such as discovery of cancers, tumors, chronic illnesses, and congenital diseases.
items.description2: Oftentimes, it's orphans who are in need of emergency medical procedures who benefit from this relief fund.

items.title: Scholarships
items.description1: We serve our families and children for more than just a particular season. We fund as many young adults as financially possible into higher education.
items.description2: Our goal is for all AEaT children to have the opportunity of seeking higher education.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description1: We walk alongside AEaT's children and families throughout their lives because we believe the key to changing the future is fostering long-term sustainability.
items.description2: AEaT Farms provides access to healthy produce for students, families, and staff of AEaT.

join.title: Join Our Work
join.subtitle: Your support can change lives. Become part of our mission to bring hope to families in Africa.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.subtitle: We've been transforming lives in Africa through sustainable programs.

testimonials.title: Stories of Hope
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from those whose lives have been transformed through our programs.
